website_summaries.verdict: Adds to high-end dining aesthetics and creates delectable culinary results in a single dish.
pros: 12-inch oval pan with low, flared side walls and loop handles
Oven and broiler safe for up to 600 degrees
We love that this elegantly designed dish is made of stainless steel
Doesn't leave an aftertaste from cooked food
With a little TLC, can hold up for over a decade
cons: A bit on the pricey side

customer_reviews.title: Great size, versatile, and cooks evenly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece as a wedding gift, because I own one and love it. It's the perfect size for a pork tenderloin, or roasting asparagus and other vegetables. I have had mine for 16 years. I clean it with Barkeeper's Friend, and it still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: JWB

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Description.
customer_reviews.text: The description for this product states they are for use with induction cooking. They DO NOT WORK WITH INDUCTION!!!
customer_reviews.author: SRTESQ

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: This product is identified as an All Clad product, by description and photo. What i received and have returned is a cheap knock off "Bon Chef"
customer_reviews.author: WMW

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, reasonably sized gratin dish. Have used it for gratin, casserole and to make nachos in. Hubby likes to reheat leftovers in it (in the oven). No coatings to flake/chip off, doesn't warp, good "heft" to it, heats evenly and has conveniently shaped handles for grabbing with oven mitts on. Another quality All Clad product that will last forever!
customer_reviews.author: A CTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Unique, versatile piece!
customer_reviews.text: True to consistent All Clad quality, this item is a great addition to my growing collection. I've only had this piece a short time but have used it a lot. It goes from oven to table with style and grace. It's the perfect size for baking 2-4 chicken breasts, small au gratin casserole, hot dips...endless possibilities. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: GramsJRA

customer_reviews.title: Another Great All-Clad Product
customer_reviews.text: Like all other All-Clad products - excellent craftmanship. None better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of incorrect measurements.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to fit in my toaster oven. The measurements in the description did not include the handles. It’s longer than described.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan is the greatest for our cooking....vegetables in the oven to fish on the gas grill. Cooks perfectly every time and cleans up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: macote

customer_reviews.title: If taken care of, it will last for generations.
customer_reviews.text: As with other All Clad cookware, it is of the highest quality.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia S. Ax

customer_reviews.title: This was a great purchase, very versatile
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase, very versatile. Beautifully constructed. Works well for cooking but also looks beautiful for serving
customer_reviews.author: SeriousShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the All-Clad line of cookware.
customer_reviews.text: Already own 4 of these and just bought 2 more. Great for anything roasted or reheated in the oven - turkey breasts, whole chickens, fish, veggies. Cleans up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pan! Bakes perfectly & goes right to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pan! Bakes perfectly & goes right to the table. I've used it to roast squash, bake Mac & Cheese, fish, roast asparagus & of course, Australia gratin potatoes. Conducts heat well & clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe's Mom

product_meta.title: All-Clad 4612 Stainless Steel Tri-Ply Bonded Dishwasher Safe Oval Au Gratin Pan/Cookware, Silver
product_meta.description: From sweet to savory, this All-Clad Stainless 4612 12-Inch oval au gratin is ideal for preparing dishes like cobblers, baked macaroni and cheese, broiled fish, crabcakes and, of course, au gratin potatoes. This traditional French vessel features low, flared side walls and two loop handles to easily transport meals from oven to table. All-Clad’s Stainless 3-ply cookware features a thick-gauge aluminum core that attracts heat fast, while the addition of stainless steel ensures even heat distribution for consistent results across the entire cooking surface, all the way to the rim. Even more, its stainless-steel interior with a starburst finish offers natural stick resistance, letting you know when food is ready to release, and it won’t react with ingredients, so there’s no risk of food picking up a metallic taste. Made in the USA, this stainless-steel cookware offers warp-resistant strength and dishwasher-safe convenience, plus it can be used on any cooktop, including induction. Discover what it means to cook with All-Clad’s most popular cookware collection–All-Clad Stainless is a classic choice for anyone who loves to cook.
feature_bullets: 12-Inch oval au gratin with low, flared side walls and loop handles - perfect for creating au gratin potatoes or cobblers
3-ply bonded construction consists of durable stainless steel encapsulating an aluminum core for even heating throughout
Highly polished cooking surface with starburst finish offers stick resistance and easy maintenance, plus won’t react with food
Contoured stainless-steel handles permanently secured with stainless-steel rivets; capacity etched on base
Oven- and broiler-safe up to 600 degrees F; induction compatible; limited lifetime warranty; Made in USA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars23 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
